snippet.title: Diacrisis Official release TRAILER #2 - 4K
snippet.description:
In Diacrisis you're the captain of a prison on a snowy mountain of northen Canada, it is not the best place for a quiet evening, at a cold isolated region these felony prisoners are convicted to spend their life in jail, and things get even worse when an unexplainable atack happens in the middle of the night.

Play it on STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1037260/Diacrisis

Play MORE now for free:
https://lostinhell.com/

Join our server:
https://discord.gg/Y9q6g9Q

Soundtrack: AfterInfinity - Damned

How about some classical beat em up with a lot of gun action and overwhelming swarms of zombies? You will get thrilled with the animated storytelling and survivor horror ambience.

Twitch: https://twitch.tv/luanprates92
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DiacrisisG
Facebook: http://facebook.com/diacrisisgame
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/luanprates
Newgrounds: https://alucard.newgrounds.com/

Watch the first episode: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L-NV6Z8pYU8&list=PLN8WEPmeubGJgZLUJlRRjHnldcyVnBfv8&index=2
Watch the first TRAILER: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EZyH2Vl4Ks0&list=PLN8WEPmeubGJgZLUJlRRjHnldcyVnBfv8

Diacrisis is a 2D-Sidescrolling Beat Em'Up Horror Thriller created by Luan Prates, all rights reserved.
